data.meanings: to get the better, come upon, find, catch, take, gain the mastery over, be intelligent, skilled, meet, overtake/overcome.
data.sentence: The word ثُقِفُوا comes from the root ث ق ف and is associated with the meanings: to get the better, come upon, find, catch, take, gain the mastery over, be intelligent, skilled, meet, overtake/overcome.
The word أَيْنَمَا comes from the root ا ي ن and is associated with the meanings:

data.meanings: To drive away, execrate, deprive one of mercy and blessings, condemn, curse.The base or lower part of a palm-tree.
data.sentence: The word مَلْعُونِينَ comes from the root ل ع ن and is associated with the meanings: To drive away, execrate, deprive one of mercy and blessings, condemn, curse.The base or lower part of a palm-tree.
The word أُخِذُوا comes from the root ا خ ذ and is associated with the meanings:

data.meanings: to kill, put to death, be accused, slay/murder/kill/slaughter, attempt to kill, render person like to one killed, to wage war/combat/battle, to master, contend/fight, deadly, knew a thing thoroughly/well, become acquainted with it.
data.sentence: The word وَقُتِّلُوا comes from the root ق ت ل and is associated with the meanings: to kill, put to death, be accused, slay/murder/kill/slaughter, attempt to kill, render person like to one killed, to wage war/combat/battle, to master, contend/fight, deadly, knew a thing thoroughly/well, become acquainted with it.
